conclusion: Analyze the scene step-by-step to determine which blocks A will collide with and where it will eventually stop.
The toy car A is moving from the right side of the image towards the left side.
The blocks on the right side are arranged in a line, with the blue block being the farthest to the right.
Since A is moving from the right to the left, it will collide with the blue block on the right side.
A will travel a distance of 3 blocks (from the farthest right block to the blue block).
A will collide with the blue block.
After colliding with the blue block, A will stop at the point where it collides with the blue block.
A will collide with the blue block and stop at the point where it collides with the blue block.
